query: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.role, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM posts WHERE userId = u.id) as postCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM postLikes WHERE userId = u.id) as likeCount FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%소나무%';
